days.text: Very dry. Fine. Force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
